name: Invisibility
good_enough_80_strategy: Implement simple visibility tags (VISIBLE/HIDDEN/INVISIBLE/REVEALED) and combat targeting penalties; break invisibility on hostile action; 'see invisible' bypasses penalties. No full LoS geometry.
